physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 6; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 2-3; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled, and are located in the same position as the main sequence.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between the station manager of the British Overseas Airways Corporation (BOAC) in Bahrain and Tom Hickinbotham, the Political Agent at Bahrain. The correspondence is regarding the issuing of Personal Accident (Air Travel) insurance policies by the corporation in Bahrain, to which the Political Agent has no objection.Folio 4 is internal office notes.
